item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

seakiller:

horrid but the only script i can actually understand, nice for a fist one though, hope no one gets banned using it lol. good job

Have a good look at dates before you post. If you looked at the dates on the topic starter you will see it was posted back in 2006. It is against the rules to “Gravedig” posts. Don’t do it again.

item.title: My First Script- Willow Long Bow Fletcher
item.dc:creator: @Muchuchu Muchuchu
item.description:
@Muchuchu wrote:

Yes, I know it used clickmouse functions, but if you don’t run it for 2 hours+ and just use it while watching tv or something for a little bit you should be fine. It’s my first script so please give me some advice or tips on how to do it next time. It works fine but might not work as well for slower computers, ect.

//Start in Draynor bank, 1st booth once you walk in //once you get there log off and then log back in. You must stay in that direction the whole time //keep all chat and trades off //Drop cross-hair in runescape //Let it run

program AutoWillowLongBoyFletcher;

procedure fletch;

begin

clickmouse(218,173,true);
wait(700);
clickmouse(218,173,false); //bank
wait(600);
clickmouse(209,215,true); //use quickly
wait(2000);
wait(600);
clickmouse(629,236,false)
wait(900);
clickmouse(587,302,true);
wait(1000);
clickmouse(591,340,false);
wait(900)
clickmouse(590,415,true)
wait(1700)
clickmouse(474,80,true); //scroll up
wait(600)
clickmouse(96,77,true);
wait(400);
clickmouse(96,77,false); //logs
wait(600);
clickmouse(98,143,true); //all logs
wait(900);
clickmouse(485,40,true); // close
wait(700);
clickmouse(585,227,true);
wait(1000);
clickmouse(708,447,true);
wait(1000)
clickmouse(647,183,true);
wait(1500);
clickmouse(264,396,true);
wait(300)
clickmouse(264,396,true);
wait(2200)
clickmouse(585,227,true);
wait(600);
clickmouse(708,447,true);
wait(1500);
clickmouse(264,396,true);
wait(300)
clickmouse(264,396,true);
wait(2200)clickmouse(585,227,true);
wait(600);
clickmouse(708,447,true);
wait(1500);
clickmouse(264,396,true);
wait(300)

clickmouse(708,447,true);
wait(1500);
clickmouse(264,396,true);

clickmouse(264,396,true);
wait(2200)

end;

begin
repeat;
fletch
until(false);

end.
